thread.title: Jennifer Lawrence takes part in human pyramid with new celebrity bestie Amy Schumer | The
thread.title_full: Jennifer Lawrence takes part in human pyramid with new celebrity bestie Amy Schumer | The Advertiser

author: Network writers
title: Jennifer Lawrence takes part in human pyramid with new celebrity bestie Amy Schumer | The
text:
THEY are both smart as whips, exude talent and have the world at their feet. So it’s little surprise that Amy Schumer and Jennifer Lawrence have become great friends.
The 34-year-old Trainwreck actor uploaded photos of her and the Oscar-winning 24-year-old star of the Hunger Games movies frolicking in the sea on a beach getaway with other girlfriends.
Amy Schumer and Jennifer Lawrence (Frame content direct link: https://instagram.com/p/5yJxQiqUDJ/embed .)
As well as the human pyramid pic the comedian uploaded a photo of Jennifer Lawrence riding a jet ski with Schumer smiling gleefully on the back. She captioned the pic “Jlaw #maniac”.
She also posted another photo from the day, showing them floating on inflatable lilos with eight girlfriends around them. It’s not clear where the photos were taken.
Jet skiing (Frame content direct link: https://instagram.com/p/5w4Lr6qUMz/embed .)
Amy Schumer and Jennifer Lawrence on lilos (Frame content direct link: https://instagram.com/p/5w2yV2qUKY/embed .)
Schumer is currently riding high after her debut movie, the Judd Apatow directed Trainwreck , grossed over $US30 million ($40 million) in its first weekend.
Lawrence, who recently split from singer Chris Martin , has signed on to star in The Rosie Project , an adaptation of the 2013 best-selling Australian novel.
Funny girl ... Amy Schumer walks the red carpet at the Australian premier of Trainwreck in Sydney. Picture: Nikki Short/AAP Source: AAP
Originally published as Who’s JLaw’s supportive new bestie?
